subject: Faulty Haptic motor
description_text:
Hello Simsonn representative

I recently bought the SIMSONN PLUS X sim racing pedal, haptic reactor VAM
vibration Motor

However, it only lasted one week after I received the motors, before the
throttle motor broke and became unresponsive.

I have attached a video to this email as proof. Unfortunately, Amazon won't
let me refund the item yet because the shipment details haven't been
completed on their app.

Please reach out with a solution.

Thank you,
Collin Ezeonu.

conversations.body_text: Hi Collins Ezeonu,      We can send you a replacement VAM. The damage to the throttle motor was likely caused by excessive travel and continuous rotation under Speed mode. We recommend setting a reasonable speed range and reducing the vibration intensity—ideally around 50%, and no more than 70%. Also, try to avoid prolonged continuous operation to extend the motor’s lifespan.

That would be great, I will keep the advice in mind.

Thank you,
Collins Ezeonu
